title: Lester Wang
text:
Jiawei (Lester) Wang is a Statistics and Data Science undergraduate at UCLA. With experience spanning data analytics, visualization, and research, Lester has worked on projects in healthcare support and data-driven strategy. He is also engaged in crypto independent research, synthesizing multi-source signals into structured, audit-ready decision logs.

title: | Kaiser Permanente Medical Center | Volunteer Program Assistant |
text:
• Provided empathetic support via Zoom to inspire patients struggling with mental health


• Coordinated with staff to enhance patient care and support group logistics


• Communicated with patients regularly with cultural sensitivity and patience

title: | Gen.G | Data Analytics Intern |
text:
• Synthesized data from online products and tournaments to inform strategy and updates


• Used SQL and Google Analytics to analyze user engagement and website functionality


• Designed databases using Metabase and translated them into actionable SQL workflows


• Conducted user analysis to optimize web content and increase user interest

title: UCLA DataFest 2025 | Data Analyst, Visualization & Strategy |
text:
• Analyzed COVID-19 impacts on contract volume and firms’ geography to gauge recovery


• Built R/tidyverse pipelines and produced time-series and geospatial visualizations


• Flagged growth regions and delivered data-backed location expansion recommendations

title: | OKX | Crypto Independent Researcher |
text:
• Synthesize signals from news, community posts, price-volume trends, and whale wallet flows


• Cross-verify sources, tag provenance, and maintain audit-ready records


• Keep a structured decision log of entries, exits, assumptions, and uncertainty notes


• Run post-trade reviews to refine criteria and enforce risk limits

title: | Boda Hospital | Volunteer Hospital Admin Assistant |
text:
• Coordinated educational events and patient support groups


• Served as a liaison between patients, families, and healthcare providers


• Offered support to leukemia patients and families and guided access to resources
